class="text_word">we'd </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">reach </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" document.title: Love thou art high
